# foggle-io

Continuous deployment has never been easy but with the help of Foggle.io you can be one step closer

## Installing

Using npm:

```bash
$ pip install foggleio
```

## Usage

```python
import foggleio

foggleio.enabled('<--TENANT-ID-->', '<--FEATURE-TOGGLE-KEY-->', '<--ENVIRONMENT-->', 'my-consumer')
```
